column5: What about the reverse? I read others thoughts

Yes, but we no longer have sex or talk. We just coexist peacefully for the kids. He sleeps on the couch. 

Im codependent and would rather have the known BS of my husband then the unknown territory of another.

My husband did this to me. The rejection hurts. I came to him butt naked and ask him why he doesnt want me anymore and he said it was bc I was fat. I rebuttaled that I looked like a Roman woman painting with a belly. He said he just isn't attracted to obese girls. 

After I lost 30 lbs he apologized. But the hurt is still there. I cant have sex with this man ever again. 

We made up in Jan 2020. As he apologized he said that we both know it was true and something needed to be said.  He turned it around to blame me. I had gained weight so I guess it is my fault. 

Don't know how you can fix this without digging a deeper hole

Have you ever heard of a cat hypnotizing a bird? 
That little birdie seems calm after such an ordeal

Thanks I am on the last leg. Playing games. Its just taking me awhile to finish bc I have to use my Sons PC to do the games. I enjoyed the survey. Somethings I didn't know were "normal or common" for my diagnosis
Priceless
Good baby
I started the survey. Stopped at part 2, now can't figure out how to continue or sign in
My goal for quarntine is to shower daily. To get back in the habit of it ya know. Thats one thing I can do everyday to make myself feel better
Congratulations! How are you feeling?
Those are very good eyes
Love, love it

It wasn't your fault. Don't listen to the voices. I'm afraid of the dark too. I have candles in my room and a lighter out at all times. Then I could have some light to find more candles
 
Electronical disturbances really bother me. I feel it is tied to the light and dark forces around us. It just sets me on edge to panic. 

I'm so sorry you had this horrible night. May today be better.
What happened the 22nd june

You are very talented. I love it. I love sugar skulls to start w and it says seroquel lol

I want to color it

You make good drawings.
Thats wrong to pive a son against father. Cute video to watch, I love this kid
Hey Korea, that's really cool
Yes my friend, It comes in time of trouble, high stress. I believe it is God or some type of entity.
I smoke street weed and it helps. Its illegal here. I bought some oil from Cali and it would make me puke. I like to smoke just mother nature w least processing

I'm so sorry for your loss.(( Hugs))

Sounds like your GG had it. Thats what ppl are dying of is  Pneumonia. I've had a friend that recently went to a drive by funeral. It was very sad you just drove past the coffin and saved in your vehicle while listening on the radio to a preacher.

Idk what your family plans to do but maybe when all this is over you can come together as a family and mourn together

Ive been bodyshamed by my closest family and friends too. It sucks. It got so bad that I no longer wanted to eat in front of anyone. 

Its going to be okay. Take a deep breath and let that shit go. She is an unsensitive human for shaming you. Don't let it ruin the rest of your day. 

During this time, you maybe in lockdown like I am. Take it easy on yourself. Its okay to have lazy days during this time.
Lol I thought everyone on my ward was a devil or angel
I've been telling myself this everyday since lockdown!
I like your human
A little to close there buddy

Keto was really hard for me. I'd lose great but one cheat and I'd gain so much.  This keto diet is really good for our mental health. I've followed it off and on for about 5 years. Now I'm doing intermittent fasting OMAD. Eating whatever I want up to 1200 calories. 
But the weight loss is slow, maybe bc of carbs, maybe bc of pills. Idk

Take care, stay well!

No, it's definitely possible! I'd suggest no matter what route you take for a diet that you include calories in calories out. Try to keep your calories low
 I keep mine at 1200. But that is the recommended lowest you go.
Hello, fellow schizo here. I've slowly lost 30 of the 60 I've gained while on Aps by doing OMAD IF...so I don't do keto, just saw this in my feed.   I'm on 30 mg abilify and 24 mg perphenazine.

Lol, I've got writings like that also. I have not looked back over my journaling because it bothers me. But at one time I was rewriting the Bible in my own translation. I would write left to right and then go back and write right to left and I would write over words and all over the paper. I showed my doctor some of the writing not the Bible but other. She just recommended counseling. I went a few times but counseling doesn't help when you are delusional and psychotic. My therapist didn't believe me when I said what my role was and the way she just knocked me down, hurt me. Now we are facing crisis and even in madness my only concern was saving the world I was a messiah guess you could say. Now I am in the bed most of the day doing nothing but housework when needed I'm taking care of my children. I'm no longer the chosen one I don't know what to do about the world now. Sorry for the vent.

Hugs, good health to you and all who read this
I'm on daytime meds. Antidepressant effexor and vyvanse a stimulat prescribed for my adhd. I still sleep 14 hr s a day

I am too. This is historical. My sister doesn't want to see me. I told her it would be months. My mom said I could still come but we couldn't leave the house. 

What if they force a vaccine world wide? How can I accept that fate? What ifs role through my mind
 
I don't even want to go to the pharmacy to get my meds bc that is where sick ppl go. 

This is only going to get worse before it gets better. I don't see how we can hide from a virus forever.
Holy shit, look at that stockpile

I'm starting to freak out too. Isolation doesn't bother me but that the stores are empty. If ppl don't stop panicking and hoarding we might not have food for me or others who don't like to go out

I mail ordered my granola bars, the only thing I eat, and they aren't here yet. They were supposed to come 2 days ago. 

And if they develop a vaccine could my paranoid mind get around a world wide vaccine. What if they made it mandatory?

They deployed 2000 troops to my State bc ppl are acting like wild animals and the threat of looting is high

Mainly very religous. It starts out simple but builds on no sleep bc my voices won't be quiet. More intense religiosity to the point of thinking I'm chosen. Every breath will be a prayer or prophecy

That's how my psychosis starts

My delusions are all religous. So when well, I don't even think about religion but when psychotic or getting there my every thought is Godly. 

The universe begins showing me signs. I begin to have increased senses. Smells, sights, are so glourious. 

My last episode included me having Islamic delusions. So it isn't just christian BS that would go away of athesist.

Yes, phentermine which I wanted more for the stimulation boost did nothing for me to lose weight, nor help with me negative symptoms. 

I was also prescribed acarbose which is supposed to stop your body from absorbing carbs fully. Well I never even tried it. I was afraid I'd get diarrhea bc all I eat is carbs

I have slowly lost 30 lbs over the past 18mo by doing intermittent fasting and hiking 3-10 mi daily weather permitting

I'm on 30mg. I cut down to 15mg by myself. Told my Dr she upped back to 20mg. I feel no difference between the dosage. 

What dosage are you on?

(I'm many other rxs also)

My oldest cat is 13. I've heard they can live a long time. Also you have to change kitty litter. 

Please adopt from shelter. Animals know you rescued them.  Ours is a $25 adoption fee and that included microchipping. 
Also there is a need for fostering animals. You could take in a pg mama or some other that is in need. 

I'm excited for you. Yay! Can't wait to see.

I take vyvanse for my adhd. And used to take adderall. 

Adderall was more stimulating but I got put on vyvanse to help with my binge eating . 

Vyvanse to me is not stimulating at all. Even w adderall I could still take a nap. So it's definately blunted effect. 

I'm on max dose and I sleep about 14 hrs a day
One sitting
Wonder how often they wash that nasty shit
Mmm parasites and flesh eating bacteria
Love adelle skyfall
Yay! ((HUGS))

It is safe here. I haven't read your other posts
It's kind of triggering for me the religous psychosis. 

I hope you are okay and not manic
Why did this make me cry?
Scary

It was meant to be a reality slap when I was scared "they" were after me for preaching the truth. 

He has always had a hard take no crap approach with me. He read 1 psychology book called "Games People Play" about how even schizophrenia is a game ppl play to manipulate others.  He just doesn't beleive in mental illness.

You could be my child, right now I will only eat prepackaged foods. 

My Dr doesn't know about my eating. She knows I binge and I have adhd so I'm on vyvanse. I'm afraid she'll take that pill away if she knows I don't eat but junk. 

Plus now my mom sits with me in session and I don't want her to know why I never eat anything she cooks. It'd make her sad. And I know 100% there is nothing wrong w the food but it makes me gag and feel like I can't breathe to think to eat it

Please don't allow a Dr to diagnosis you bc of your mom's illness. Yes, you have something wrong but may not need antipsychotics

I too was so paranoid of the evils within the governement and church. I was so paranoid I thought my Dr was in on stopping me from my role, my mission at the time. 

It wasn't until I had a break while on meds that I told my Dr I really needed her help. I was scared. I got put on perphanize to my other AP. She said it was just for paranoia. It helped and now I trust my Dr and my mom

It has nothing to do with you being racist or anything. I was shouting black power out in public and was threatned to be arrested so I ran. 

Psychosis doesn't worrying about offenses but we can't shout in public lol

I had no idea. And also Shelly Duvall from the shining and popeye has it.  

It's not a respector of persons. 

What gets me is how ppl can think we chose this. That with God or LOA or postive thoughts can help us.

 Even my own husband says I make it up bc I'm a bored housewife and regret not having a career. Wtf? Tell me how that makes since?
That's a good dog
I love that show!
Work or school, back to something Monday?

I'm sorry your GF left you bc of your diagnosis but it's for the best. You don't want to be with someone who doesn't accept you as you are. 

I'm schizoaffective and lost everyone I TOLD I had it. They are scared of us. It's mental illness stigma

It hurts so bad right now, but there will be other loves. You aren't broken, don't let the label define you. 

If you haven't please join us on r/schizophrenia
We have a good chat room when the trolls leave us alone

Yes, that it's poisoning me. I hear God say "Why am I not enough for you?"

I heard that my Dr was in on it, trying to stop me from my role. 

It wasn't until a break in 2018 while on meds, that I finally told me Dr I was scared even of her giving me a chemical labotomy.

I told her I'd trust her to help me and she added another AP called, Perphenazine, she said just to help w paranoia
 
Now, I know my Dr and my Pills are here to help me live life as comfortable and normally as possible
Yay! Continue on in Beast Mode! You got this

Congrats on 1 yr anniversary! I tell you it's a nice combo

I take meds but when I met my friend and we started hanging out daily my mental health went up better then w an Antidepressant 
 
Yay! I'm happy for you.

Congrats on your weight loss so far. And thank you for your service. 

You are making a lot of changes at once. If you are comfortable doing so go for it. Full throttle ahead!
Nilla wafers
I love it!
My cat does this...never knew dogs do it too!
Aww, help a guy out and pick him up, throw over the wall to what is the great unknown.

A Dr can diagnosis you, it's just going to be you reaching out to your parents for help. 

I had those same problems as a teen and they stayed with me until diagnosis and medication. 

I used to try and pray away the thoughts and extreme emotions but nothing helped until science gave me a pill. Then everything was gone. It was quiet in my mind. 

You're still a growing brain. Idk as a mother how'd I'd feel about medicating my child. Therapy may also help and you wouldn't have to take meds. 

So please reach out to your parents, Dr, or other trusted adult.
That's one angry turtle

Yes, you were severely abused. I'm sorry honey
((Hugs))
Aww, post this in r/Aww please
I used to have a boy just like that. RIP Big mean kitty. (That was his name bc he was really mean)

Yes 2 Aps will help you. I'm on max dose abilify and 24 mg Perphanize. 

The perphanize was added to help with paranoia
That was weird
Sounds just as I do. Even the dead ppl watching me masturbate but that is only bc my mom told me they watch me all the time.

With 2 antipsychotics yes, a hard slap to the face .

Now I want off them, Hmmm wonder if it would come back?
Online, posted link

https://www.areotatel.com/products/pink-freud-dark-side-of-your-mom-pink-floyd-sigmund-freud-t-shirt?variant=1000001392322524&gclid=CjwKCAiA66_xBRBhEiwAhrMuLfvIMhcUhnNdrnWRcF1MlEgplJssELiYnoK_mwXaIh-imEoca6CewBoCLYQQAvD_BwE
We are all Gems aren't we. Shine on

Yes Lamictal is a great mood stabilzer. There are a few others mood stabilizers but tons of Aps. 

I hope you research some different meds and side effects of each and our able to chose what med you want by next visit

Me too, I have schizoaffective ask for Lamictal to stablize mood and switch to a new Aps. 

Seroquel made my Dad gain 60 lbs and sit in his chair all day. They are much better options. 

It took me 7 yrs to find a good combo

I just like the meme, never been on it. I'm on 30mg Abilify and 24mg perphanize the suggested max dose of each. 

I'm going to talk to my Dr about lowering it. I'm better now, I don't need 2 Aps max dose

For real, WTF. I'm going to look up the full lyrics. I've got this funny meme that says:

"Seroquel, Can't have delusions when your asleep. " with a man passed out. 

It's so true, I sleep 12-14 hrs a day. On 2 MFING Aps. I don't want this lazy life!

It's a catchy tune. Lol I can't figure out what happened to the search button in my music app bc I wanted to download it to my playlist 
Lol
Peace be upon you
You are a light bearer but no one wants light.
Yes, your right but I don't beleive in Him anymore. I can no longer hear the voice of my Creator. If the voice was really from my creator, he could work through prescriptions

I know it doesnt. 
But I take meds bc w/o them I get too high and end up naked in public shouting the return of yeshua. 

In 2018 I thought I was the savior of muslims. So it's not just christian faith. 

I have the "I'm chosen" ego
Forget my mission to bring love and peace to the world by preaching full acceptance of others without expectations of change. World peace
Yes, now bc meditation lead me into others realms. A great spiritual awakening but I take the pills to forget
Om Namah Shivay will carry you away to another realm if you let it.
Brings me to close to spirit but it feels good so I do about 1x a month 48 hr fast and daily OMAD

I'm chosen one too. That's why I love this group. Never met so many that beleive like me but beleive totally different things in how it will all end or begin . 

I'm here to usher in the new beggining when others fear it the end. I teach the way to peace and love. The biggest way to that is to accept others as they are without expectation of change. 

I feel it a dangerous mission and they may come for me. 

BUT on 2 Aps, I'm feeling better. Grounded, agnostic, no more weight of the world on my shoulders. I chose to take the pills and forget my mission on earth.
I fast intermittently, I've lost 30 lbs slooowly

Sedation. It works the same way as on us. 
 It wouldn't harm you to take it except for side effects...which wouldn't happen w just one pill. 

24 hours a day, I wanna be sedated.~the ramones. 

WTF Ramones, F you, who wants that? I don't. I want to be free from meds and not insane

I used to take 5hpt before I got an antidepressant.  It really helped. 

You're username, I used to be a fitness instructor. What about you? Are you into fitness?

I stay away from. All religous and spiritual things bc my voices are Elohim, Angels, and the dark forces.

So yes, it is so real. It's real to me and scares me. I want to be part of this realm. I have 2 more kids at home left to raise. I've got to focus on them and take my meds as prescribed. 

Meds make me forgot my mission of bringing peace and love to earth.
Np, take care

You are doing great! I'm proud of you. Writing and journaling are great coping skills. My illness started around 7 yr old the dark forces would tell me to kill myself and I would try by hitting myself or drinking swig of bleach. 

Idk what age but I got homicidal as well. I was bullied at school and abused at home. At 18 yrs old Columbine happened. All I could think of was how I had the same plans but they followed the command. I did not

Keep up your coping skills, don't follow commands and reach out if you are feeling worse in your symptoms. 

Peace be with you

Good, I'm glad you see the danger in command voices.

I battled voices and madness even on meds. I've been on them 7 yrs now. I feel better now. But my Dr said not to expect 100% just about 75% wellness
 
Are you medicated?

Just bc your demons are bad doesn't mean your a bad person. 

Intrusive thoughts or implanted thoughts I call seem so foriegn to us. It's okay to have bad thoughts, It doesn't mean your a bad person.

Be careful with commands. Do not follow commands. Or you'll end up doing deranged things like me or worse. It's so shameful and ppl don't forget your behavior no matter how much you apologize.

My demon mascrades as God and angels. 

Tells me to quit all meds and just smoke weed.
Tells me my family is a false idol and need to be homeless to transform into my role as an angel. 

I am an angel. Sent here to bring peace and love after what many say is destruction. What they fear is the way to peace and love. 

So some good but mixed w bad. Like God commanded me to mix $500 worth of Spiknard into my father's ashes and rub them on my face mixed w tears. Grit of ashes and bones. 

Why would I follow that command. I'm so ashamed of my behavior 

BUT I'm better now.

I'd talk w your Dr about more meds. My whole life revolved around what God, Angels, and Demons would tell me. 

Now on 2 Aps and 7 yrs of trying meds, I finally am free from all religous bullshit. 

It's just bullshit my friend. Deciding rather to stop or not is up to you. But one change leads to another command to change
 
It will never stop commanding you so I'd ignore it.
Np ((hugs))
